properties.query:
//Title: BAH_T1112Activity
//Description: Looks for common registry keys and commands relatated to MITRE technique T1112
//https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1112/
//https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/master/atomics/T1112/T1112.md
//Author: Mike Gibbs, Rob Russell
let signInLookup = (
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| where DeviceDetail contains "displayName"
| extend DeviceDetailJson = parse_json(DeviceDetail)
| extend DeviceNameSI = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| distinct DeviceNameSI, UserPrincipalName, UserDisplayName
);
let RegKeysToSearch = dynamic([@"Software\Classes\.wav\OpenWithProgIds", 
                               @"Software\Wow6432Node\Facebook_Assistant",
                               @"Software\Wow6432Node\BlackLivesMatter",
                               @"Software\Classes\ms-settings\shell\open\command",
                               @"Software\Firm\Soft",
                               @"Software\Wow6432Node\Facebook_Assistant",
                               @"Security\Policy\Secrets\n"]); //Revil Ransomware , Snake Malware and fodhelper UAC bypass win10+, Hive Ransomware
let RegExeKeysToSearch = dynamic([@"AppDataLow\Software\Microsoft", 
                                  @"Policies\Microsoft\Windows\OOBE",
                                  @"Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon",
                                  @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\Currentversion\Winlogon",
                                  @"\CurrentControlSet\Control\SecurityProviders\WDigest",
                                  @"Microsoft\Windows Defender",
                                  @"Software\Classes\.wav\OpenWithProgIds",
                                  @"Software\Wow6432Node\Facebook_Assistant",
                                  @"Software\Wow6432Node\BlackLivesMatter",
                                  @"Software\Classes\ms-settings\shell\open\command",
                                  @"Security\Policy\Secrets\"]);  //turla
search in (DeviceRegistryEvents, DeviceProcessEvents)*
| where (
((RegistryKey has_any (RegKeysToSearch))) 
or
((RegistryKey endswith @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\UMe" or 
RegistryKey endswith @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\UT")) 
or
((RegistryKey contains @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Active Setup\Installed Components" and RegistryKey endswith @"\StubPath"))
or 
((InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith @"reg.exe") and 
(InitiatingProcessCommandLine has_any (RegExeKeysToSearch))))
| extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
| join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, RegistryKey, InitiatingProcessFileName, Reference = "https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/master/atomics/T1112/T1112.md"
